Description: A single class in pure VB.NET code to create and control an OpenGL window by calling opengl32.dll directly without use of additional wrapper libraries.

Project Description
A single class in pure VB.NET code to create and control an OpenGL window by calling opengl32.dll directly without use of additional wrapper libraries.


Ever wanted to harness the power of OpenGL from VB.NET without having to include 3rd party libraries?

Wouldn't it be great if you could just instantiate a single class to do all the heavy lifting for you so you can focus on the model driving
your visualisation?

Well here it is!

The aim of this project is to create a view controller class in the MVC sense to drive an opengl "View" window from a model of your own design.

Note this is not a library but template code which can be adapted to your own needs
